thread.title: Regulators, lawmakers tighten Takata recall scrutiny
thread.title_full: Regulators, lawmakers tighten Takata recall scrutiny

title: Regulators, lawmakers tighten Takata recall scrutiny
text:
Regulators, lawmakers tighten Takata ... Regulators, lawmakers tighten Takata recall scrutiny Next Story Prev Story 6 hrs ago Read more: Reuters 
U.S. regulators will decide next month whether to take the unprecedented step of coordinating the Takata air bag inflator recall, saying the task of replacing nearly 24 million potentially deadly devices could be too massive to succeed without intervention. At a public presentation on the recall that currently spans 12 automakers, regulators on Thursday laid out a range of options from naming an independent overseer and speeding up recalls for priority vehicles to enlisting independent repair shops in the replacement effort. Start the conversation, or Read more at Reuters.
